name: Evercloak Inc.
description:
Evercloak is tackling global climate challenges by innovating with materials. Our low-cost nanofilms and membranes are competitive and energy efficient.

With our breakthrough membrane dehumidification technology, Evercloak aims to reduce the energy that air conditioners consume by more than 50%.
slogan: Material innovation company, revolutionizing industrial processes with 2Dnano films and membranes.
